content:
TITLE: Querying Canister with Candid File
DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to query a canister using a Candid file for argument validation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/dfinity/agent-rs/blob/main/icx/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
icx query 75hes-oqbaa-aaaaa-aaaaa-aaaaa-aaaaa-aaaaa-q greet --candid=~/path/greet.did '("World")'
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Basic Canister Management Example
DESCRIPTION: Example of calling the management canister's create_canister function using ICX.
SOURCE: https://github.com/dfinity/agent-rs/blob/main/icx/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
icx update aaaaa-aa create_canister
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Check Request Status
DESCRIPTION: Example of checking the status of a previously sent request using the request status message.
SOURCE: https://github.com/dfinity/agent-rs/blob/main/icx/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
cat request_status.json | icx --fetch-root-key send
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Sign Message for Offline Usage
DESCRIPTION: Example of serializing a signed canister call message for later use, useful for air-gapped scenarios.
SOURCE: https://github.com/dfinity/agent-rs/blob/main/icx/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
icx --fetch-root-key update --serialize rwlgt-iiaaa-aaaaa-aaaaa-cai greet '("everyone")' > output.txt
head -n 1 output.txt > update.json
tail -n 1 output.txt > request_status.json
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Send Signed Message
DESCRIPTION: Example of sending a previously signed message to the Internet Computer.
SOURCE: https://github.com/dfinity/agent-rs/blob/main/icx/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
cat update.json | icx send
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing ICX Using Cargo
DESCRIPTION: Instructions for cloning and building the ICX tool locally using Cargo build system.
SOURCE: https://github.com/dfinity/agent-rs/blob/main/icx/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
git clone https://github.com/dfinity/agent-rust.git
cd agent-rust
cargo build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Demonstrating Certificate Printing with Gzip Encoding in Rust
DESCRIPTION: Illustrates using the icx-cert tool to print certificate information for a canister HTTP asset, accepting gzip encoding. This shows how the response changes when accepting an encoding that browsers commonly use.
SOURCE: https://github.com/dfinity/agent-rs/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-20_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
$ cargo run -p icx-cert -- print --accept-encoding gzip 'http://localhost:8000/index.js?canisterId=ryjl3-tyaaa-aaaaa-aaaba-cai'
DATA HASH: 1770e76af0816ba951320c03eab1263c43de7ac4b0558dd9049cc532b7d6cd01
    Label("/index.js", Leaf(0x1495cd574831c23b4db97bc3860666ea495386f0ef0dab73c23ef31db5aa2765)),
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Demonstrating Certificate Printing with Identity Encoding in Rust
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to use the icx-cert tool to print certificate information for a canister HTTP asset, accepting only the identity encoding. This demonstrates the default behavior of the tool.
SOURCE: https://github.com/dfinity/agent-rs/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
$ cargo run -p icx-cert -- print 'http://localhost:8000/index.js?canisterId=ryjl3-tyaaa-aaaaa-aaaba-cai'
DATA HASH: 1495cd574831c23b4db97bc3860666ea495386f0ef0dab73c23ef31db5aa2765
    Label("/index.js", Leaf(0x1495cd574831c23b4db97bc3860666ea495386f0ef0dab73c23ef31db5aa2765)),
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building DFINITY Agent with Cargo
DESCRIPTION: Command to build the DFINITY agent repository using cargo. Requires rust stable to be installed on the system.
SOURCE: https://github.com/dfinity/agent-rs/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
cargo build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Repository Migration URL in Markdown
DESCRIPTION: Link to the new location of the IC Certification library repository.
SOURCE: https://github.com/dfinity/agent-rs/blob/main/ic-certification/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
# IC Certification

This library has been moved to https://github.com/dfinity/response-verification.
```
